## MORAL-PRAGMATICS

This directory contains the dataset files for the TACL submission.

### Files Overview

* **COT.MIC.Judgment.json:** Contains training data generated by prompting off-the-shelf LLMs in a standard Chain-of-Thought (CoT) setting for moral judgment performance.  
* **COT.MIC.MFT.json:** Contains training data generated by prompting off-the-shelf LLMs in a standard Chain-of-Thought (CoT) setting for moral foundations classification.  
* **ours.MIC.train.json:** This is the **training dataset** used for our moral pragmatic inference.
